thread.title: Ian Napleton
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Ian Napleton

author: Ian Napleton
title: Ian Napleton
text: Having declined Interflora's kind offer of extortionate Valentines gifts, I googled "Flowers for delivery uk". Prestige Flowers were the first "hit" so I clicked. Very impressed with the range on offer and the prices. I'm confident that the gift I selected will be delivered on the 14th and make my wife happy!
